jobs.title: AI Product Manager
jobs.descriptionHtml:
What You’ll Do

  • Product Strategy & Roadmap

    • Conduct market research, user analysis, and competitive landscape analysis for the AI agent product to define a clear product positioning and growth strategy.

    • Plan and manage the product roadmap, defining core objectives, feature priorities, and delivery timelines for each phase.

    • Collaborate closely with management, engineering, design, and marketing teams to ensure alignment between the product vision and business goals.

  • Product Design & Development

    • Design high-quality product solutions and write user stories based on a deep understanding of user needs and application scenarios.

    • Work with designers and engineers to create intuitive, efficient, and engaging user experiences and product features.

    • Lead the entire product development lifecycle, including requirement reviews, development tracking, testing, and release, to ensure high-quality product delivery.

  • Data-Driven Optimization

    • Establish a monitoring system for Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to evaluate product performance and user behavior through data analysis.

    • Utilize A/B testing and user feedback to continuously iterate and optimize product features, enhancing user satisfaction and core business metrics.

    • Stay current with industry trends, especially the latest advancements in large language models and AI agents, and transform them into opportunities for product innovation.

What We’re Looking For

  • A Bachelor's/Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Design, or a related field.

  • 3+ years of product management experience in the internet or software industry, with a proven track record of building products from scratch (0 to 1) being a strong plus.

  • A strong technical background with a solid understanding of AI Agent workflows.

  • Exceptional logical thinking, data analysis, and problem-solving skills, with the ability to structure complex problems and propose innovative solutions.

  • Excellent communication, coordination, and leadership skills to effectively drive cross-functional teams toward common goals.

  • Prior experience in product design or software development is a plus.

 - Excellent communication, coordination, and leadership skills to effectively drive cross-functional teams toward common goals.

 - Prior experience in product design or software development is a plus.

jobs.title: Product Manager - Monetization & Growth
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Challenges

  • Scaling AI-powered monetization in a rapidly evolving landscape. You'll tackle the complex challenge of quantifying international market opportunities for AI products, developing data-driven audience segmentations that account for varying AI adoption rates across regions, and establishing metrics that balance user value with commercial objectives.

  • Designing seamless AI monetization experiences. You'll face the challenge of ensuring every monetization touchpoint feels natural within AI workflows—making premium features, usage-based pricing, and subscription models feel intuitive rather than intrusive while maintaining our commitment to exceptional user experience.

  • Navigating global AI market dynamics. The challenge of coordinating with Engineering, Marketing, and regional teams becomes more complex when tailoring AI product pricing, payment workflows, and messaging to markets with vastly different AI readiness, regulatory environments, and user expectations around AI capabilities.

  • Rapid iteration in the AI product space. You'll face the ongoing challenge of delivering minimum-viable AI features at speed, incorporating both stakeholder feedback and rapidly changing user expectations around AI capabilities, while iterating decisively to stay ahead of the fast-moving AI product landscape.

We want people that...

  • You have a strong track record of delivering impactful product launches and improvements in AI or adjacent technology spaces. You ideally have 4+ years of relevant work experience in growth product management.

  • You possess advanced SQL skills and solid command of experimental design, with specific experience in AI product metrics. You can confidently discuss metrics like feature adoption rates, usage-based pricing optimization, and the unique statistical challenges of measuring AI product performance.

  • You consistently articulate data-driven trade-offs to cross-functional teams. You foster alignment and timely decision-making when balancing user experience, and monetization strategies.

Bonus points for...

  • Experience with AI-powered products, machine learning platforms, or developer tools

  • Background in mobile ad tech, payments, or creator-economy platforms with AI components

  • Deep familiarity with AI-specific UX patterns and user behavior

  • Understanding of AI model costs, usage-based pricing, and computational resource optimization

About Manus AI

Manus is a general AI agent that bridges minds and actions: it doesn't just think, it delivers results. Manus excels at various tasks in work and life, getting everything done while you rest.At Manus AI, we offer a highly collaborative and innovative environment where experts across engineering, research, and business come together to push the boundaries of AI applications. If you're passionate about cutting-edge technology and making a real impact, we’d love to hear from you!

Contact us: recruiting@manus.im

jobs.title: Test Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts covering core product features

  • Build and optimize automation testing frameworks to enhance testing efficiency and coverage

  • Work closely with development teams to analyze requirements, create comprehensive test plans, and ensure product functionality is complete and stable

  • Conduct functional, performance, regression, and stress testing to identify and track issues promptly

  • Develop and maintain test cases ensuring testing coverage meets quality standards

  • Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines for continuous quality improvement

  • Produce regular testing reports with comprehensive product quality assessments and improvement recommendations

  • Keep current with testing technology trends and introduce innovative tools and methodologies to the team

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field

  • Minimum 3 years of software testing experience with strong emphasis on test automation (Selenium, Cypress, Appium, etc.)

  • Proficiency in at least one programming language (Python, Java, JavaScript, or Go) for writing efficient test scripts

  • Deep understanding of testing processes, tools, and frameworks, with solid knowledge of CI/CD workflows

  • Hands-on experience with API testing tools (Postman, JMeter) and automation methodologies

  • Performance and stress testing experience is highly desirable

  • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities with keen attention to detail and commitment to product quality

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience testing AI or SaaS products

  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and distributed system testing

  • International team collaboration experience is a plus

About Manus AI

Manus is a general AI agent that bridges minds and actions: it doesn't just think, it delivers results. Manus excels at various tasks in work and life, getting everything done while you rest.

At Manus AI, we offer a highly collaborative and innovative environment where experts across engineering, research, and business come together to push the boundaries of AI applications. If you're passionate about cutting-edge technology and making a real impact, we’d love to hear from you!

Contact us: recruiting@manus.im

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Manus AI, we're building the future of autonomous AI agents that can understand, reason, and act in complex digital environments. Our challenge is making these powerful AI capabilities accessible and intuitive for everyday users.
We are looking for a designer with excellent interaction design skills and a strong sense of visual aesthetics to enhance the user experience within our product.

Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers and engineers.

  • Participate in every stage of the product development cycle, from ideation to delivering high-quality, launch-ready designs.

  • Rapidly prototype conceptual product ideas, design user flows informed by data analysis and user research, collect feedback from stakeholders, and iterate to deliver the best user experience.

  • Continuously integrate user feedback and business requirements into product improvements.

Qualifications

  • 3+ years of experience designing UX across mobile and web, preferably in Artificial Intelligence–related products (e.g., AI tools).

  • Strong product thinking, design thinking, and visual design skills.

  • Proven experience collaborating with user research, data analysis, product managers, and engineering teams to deliver live products.

  • Hands-on experience with A/B testing and data-driven design practices.

  • Deep understanding of Design Systems, including principles, processes, and lifecycle management.

  • Having a keen eye on design trends and cutting edge technologies

  • Excellent communication skills, with the ability to articulate design decisions and collaborate effectively in a fast-paced environment.

Bonus points if you have experience with

  • Conversational AI or chatbot design

  • Experience in building and maintaining design systems

  • Motion design skills

About Manus AI

Manus is a general AI agent that bridges minds and actions: it doesn't just think, it delivers results. Manus excels at various tasks in work and life, getting everything done while you rest.

At Manus AI, we offer a highly collaborative and innovative environment where experts across engineering, research, and business come together to push the boundaries of AI applications. If you're passionate about cutting-edge technology and making a real impact, we’d love to hear from you!

Contact us: recruiting@manus.im

jobs.title: DevOps&SRE Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Key Responsibilities

Cluster Operations & Management

  • Manage and maintain container clusters (Kubernetes, Docker) and open-source component clusters (Kafka, Redis, Elasticsearch) across multiple business units

  • Ensure optimal performance, scalability, and reliability of distributed systems

Infrastructure Platform Development

  • Design, build, and enhance infrastructure operation platforms

  • Develop and maintain systems for infrastructure management, CI/CD pipelines, monitoring/alerting, and centralized logging

  • Drive platform standardization and automation initiatives

High Availability & Reliability

  • Ensure maximum uptime for production services through proactive monitoring and incident response

  • Continuously optimize service architecture, deployment strategies, and operational processes

  • Implement and maintain SLA/SLO frameworks and reliability engineering practices

Automation & Process Improvement

  • Lead the development of automated operations and maintenance systems

  • Create self-service tools and workflows to improve team productivity

  • Establish best practices for infrastructure such as code and configuration management

Required Qualifications

Experience & Education

  • 2+ years of hands-on experience in Systems Operations, DevOps, or Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related technical field preferred

Cloud & Infrastructure

  • Experience with public cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP) is highly valued

  • Strong understanding of large-scale internet architecture and distributed systems

  • Proven experience with infrastructure monitoring, logging, and observability tools

Technical Skills

  • Proficiency in scripting and automation using Shell, Python, or similar languages

  • Strong knowledge of containerization technologies (Kubernetes, Docker)

  • Hands-on experience operating production-grade container clusters and managing CI/CD pipelines

  • Strong familiarity with common infrastructure components: Nginx, MySQL, Redis, Kafka, Elasticsearch

Advanced Networking (Preferred)

  • Experience with Service Mesh architectures, Cilium CNI, and eBPF technologies

  • Understanding network security, load balancing, and traffic management

  • Knowledge of cloud-native networking patterns and best practices

jobs.title: Senior Kubernetes Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Job Responsibilities

Kubernetes & Container Platform Leadership:

  • Architect, deploy, and maintain enterprise-scale Kubernetes clusters with 99.9%+ uptime in mission-critical production environments

  • Lead containerization initiatives using Docker and advanced container orchestration strategies

  • Design and optimize sophisticated CI/CD pipelines with multi-environment deployment strategies and zero-downtime releases

  • Drive Kubernetes best practices across development teams and establish container governance standards

Advanced Infrastructure & Service Management:

  • Implement and manage service mesh architectures (Istio/Linkerd) for comprehensive microservices governance and observability

  • Serve as the primary escalation point for complex Kubernetes cluster troubleshooting and containerized application issues

  • Develop and enforce robust cluster security policies, RBAC configurations, and container security scanning protocols

  • Execute cost optimization strategies for Kubernetes workloads and container resource allocation

Technology Innovation & Platform Evolution:

  • Stay at the forefront of cloud-native technologies including Service Mesh, Serverless computing, and emerging Kubernetes ecosystem tools

  • Evaluate and implement cutting-edge containerization technologies to enhance platform capabilities

  • Lead proof-of-concept initiatives for new Kubernetes features and container runtime technologies

Requirements

Core Kubernetes & Docker Expertise (Non-Negotiable):

  • Minimum 3+ years of hands-on Kubernetes production experience with demonstrated expertise in cluster architecture, networking, and storage

  • Expert-level Docker containerization skills including multi-stage builds, image optimization, and container security hardening

  • Deep understanding of Kubernetes internals: etcd, kube-apiserver, scheduler, controller-manager, and kubelet operations

  • Production-grade experience managing Kubernetes clusters serving high-traffic applications with complex workload requirements

Technical Foundation:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent practical experience

  • Minimum 4+ years in cloud-native/containerization environments with progressive responsibility

  • Advanced proficiency in Go (Golang) for Kubernetes operator development and custom resource creation

  • Strong scripting capabilities in Python, Bash, and YAML for automation and infrastructure as code

Kubernetes Ecosystem Mastery:

  • Extensive experience with Kubernetes-native monitoring and observability stack: Prometheus, Grafana, Jaeger, Tempo, Loki

  • Proven expertise in service mesh technologies (Istio preferred) for traffic management and security policies

  • Advanced knowledge of Kubernetes networking: CNI plugins, ingress controllers, network policies, and service discovery

  • Experience with Kubernetes storage solutions: persistent volumes, storage classes, and stateful application management

Enterprise Container Operations:

  • Demonstrated success in containerizing and orchestrating complex applications: MySQL clusters, Redis, Kafka, Elasticsearch, and distributed systems

  • Expertise in DevOps methodologies including GitOps, infrastructure as code (Terraform/Helm), and automated testing pipelines

  • Hands-on experience with major cloud Kubernetes services: EKS (AWS), AKS (Azure), GKE (Google Cloud)

  • Exceptional troubleshooting skills for performance optimization, resource tuning, and incident response

Preferred Qualifications

Advanced Certifications & Expertise:

  • Kubernetes certifications strongly preferred: Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA), Certified Kubernetes Application Developer (CKAD), or Certified Kubernetes Security Specialist (CKS)

  • Cloud platform certifications: AWS Solutions Architect, Azure DevOps Engineer, or Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect

  • Service Mesh expertise: Production experience with Istio, Linkerd, or Consul Connect

  • Serverless container experience: Knative, AWS Fargate, or Azure Container Instances

Leadership & Scale Experience:

  • Experience managing large-scale Kubernetes clusters (500+ nodes, 1000+ pods)

  • Track record of leading container migration projects from legacy infrastructure

  • Open source contributions to Kubernetes ecosystem projects or CNCF initiatives

  • Experience mentoring teams on Kubernetes adoption and container best practices

Specialized Skills:

  • Multi-cluster management and federation experience

  • Advanced Kubernetes security implementations including Pod Security Standards and admission controllers

  • Experience with emerging technologies: WebAssembly (WASM) containers, confidential computing, or edge Kubernetes deployments

About Manus AI

Manus is a general AI agent that bridges minds and actions: it doesn't just think, it delivers results. Manus excels at various tasks in work and life, getting everything done while you rest.

At Manus AI, we offer a highly collaborative and innovative environment where experts across engineering, research, and business come together to push the boundaries of AI applications. If you're passionate about cutting-edge technology and making a real impact, we’d love to hear from you!

Contact us: recruiting@manus.im

jobs.title: Backend Engineer - Infrastructure & Business Systems
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We're seeking a skilled Backend Engineer to join our growing team and drive the development of Manus's core infrastructure and business systems. This role offers the opportunity to work across two specialized tracks: infrastructure engineering and business application development, allowing you to shape both the technical foundation and user-facing features of our AI-powered platform.

Key Responsibilities

Core Backend Development

  • Build high-performance, scalable backend services using Golang to support core AI product features

  • Design, develop, and optimize APIs (RESTful and GraphQL) ensuring efficient frontend-backend interactions

  • Participate in system architecture design to ensure stability, reliability, and scalability at enterprise scale

  • Handle large-scale data flows and optimize distributed systems for peak performance

  • Collaborate closely with frontend and AI agent teams to support rapid product iteration cycles

  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code following industry best practices

Infrastructure Track (Option A)

Middleware & Core Systems Management

  • Maintain and optimize Manus's foundational middleware stack including databases, caching layers, logging systems, and message queues

  • Design and manage Kubernetes cluster architecture for optimal resource utilization and fault tolerance

  • Implement monitoring, alerting, and observability solutions across all infrastructure components

  • Ensure high availability and disaster recovery capabilities for mission-critical systems

E2B Cluster Operations

  • Oversee maintenance, configuration, and enhancement of Manus's E2B cluster infrastructure

  • Drive capacity planning and scaling initiatives to meet growing demand

  • Implement cost optimization strategies while maintaining performance standards

  • Collaborate with DevOps teams to streamline deployment and operational workflows

Business Systems Track (Option B)

Core Business Development

  • Develop and maintain user management systems, authentication, and authorization frameworks

  • Build integrations with marketing automation platforms and operational tools

  • Create robust APIs for customer onboarding, engagement tracking, and lifecycle management

  • Implement analytics and reporting systems for business intelligence

Payment & Monetization Platform

  • Design and develop comprehensive payment processing systems with multiple gateway integrations

  • Build credit and points management systems with real-time balance tracking

  • Implement coupon, discount, and promotional campaign management features

  • Develop membership and subscription management capabilities with automated billing

  • Ensure PCI compliance and implement fraud detection mechanisms

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related technical field

  • Minimum 3 years of backend development experience with demonstrated expertise in Golang

  • Strong understanding of microservices architecture and service orchestration tools (gRPC, Kubernetes)

  • Proficiency in database design, optimization, and management (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)

  • Hands-on experience with distributed systems, message queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ), and caching technologies (Redis)

jobs.title: Accountant
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Us

We are a rapidly scaling AI startup backed by leading investors and a global team of technologists. We are building intelligent products that are changing the way businesses operate. As we expand across markets and establish our headquarters in Singapore, we are hiring a detail-oriented and proactive Accountant to support our day-to-day financial operations and ensure accurate, timely reporting across our entities.

Role Summary

The Accountant will support the Finance team in maintaining accurate financial records, ensuring compliance with accounting standards, and contributing to month-end close processes. You will work closely with internal teams and external service providers to manage transactions, reconciliations, and reporting in a multi-entity, multi-currency environment.

Key Responsibilities

  • Perform day-to-day accounting tasks, including journal entries, accounts payable/receivable, and bank reconciliations

  • Assist with monthly, quarterly, and annual close processes

  • Maintain accurate general ledger and support group consolidation activities

  • Prepare financial reports and support management with variance analysis

  • Support GST/VAT submissions and ensure tax and statutory compliance in relevant jurisdictions

  • Work with external accountants, auditors, and tax advisors across multiple countries

  • Help implement and improve accounting systems, processes, and automation tools

  • Maintain organized documentation and ensure adherence to internal controls and policies

  • Assist with budgeting support and audit preparation as needed

Requirements

  • Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field

  • Minimum 3–5 years of relevant experience in accounting

  • Prior experience in a startup, tech, or multi-entity environment is a plus

  • Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., Xero, QuickBooks, NetSuite) and Excel/Google Sheets

  • Solid understanding of accounting principles (IFRS or local GAAP)

  • Strong attention to detail and organizational skills

  • Ability to work independently, manage deadlines, and communicate effectively

  • Comfortable in a dynamic, fast-paced environment

What We Offer

  • Opportunity to grow with a scaling startup and take on regional exposure

  • Flexible work environment and collaborative team culture

  • Hands-on experience with global finance operations and automation tools

About Manus AI

Manus is a general AI agent that bridges minds and actions: it doesn't just think, it delivers results. Manus excels at various tasks in work and life, getting everything done while you rest.

At Manus AI, we offer a highly collaborative and innovative environment where experts across engineering, research, and business come together to push the boundaries of AI applications. If you're passionate about cutting-edge technology and making a real impact, we’d love to hear from you!

jobs.title: Product Marketing Intern
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We're looking for a passionate marketing strategist to develop compelling EDM email marketing campaigns and analyze performance data for our cutting-edge AI Agent products.

Core Responsibilities:
1. Create and execute EDM email marketing strategies with personalized content for different user segments
2. Write engaging email copy including subject lines, body content, and CTAs
3. Design email templates and visual elements maintaining brand consistency
4. Monitor and analyze email marketing KPIs (open rates, click rates, conversion rates)
5. Conduct A/B testing and create data analysis reports for continuous optimization
6. Transform complex AI Agent features into compelling marketing narratives

Requirements:
1. Currently pursuing Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field
2. At least one previous internship experience in marketing, digital marketing, or related field
3. Deep understanding of AI technology and products, especially AI Agent capabilities
4. Excellent English and Chinese writing skills with proven content creation abilities
5. Strong English proficiency for cross-cultural communication and content creation
6. Basic knowledge of data analysis methods and digital marketing concepts
7. Ability to translate complex AI concepts into accessible marketing content
8. Must be available for onsite work in Singapore

Preferred Qualifications:
1. Portfolio of outstanding content creation work or writing samples
2. In-depth knowledge of AI industry trends and developments
3. Near-native English writing ability
4. Experience with email marketing or digital marketing campaigns

Join us if you're curious about AI products and ready to gain valuable experience in a fast-growing tech company!

jobs.descriptionHtml:
About the job

Responsibilities:

  • Drive partnership strategy & pipeline: Independently source, qualify, and manage a pipeline of strategic partners through person networks, outreach email, LinkedIn, calls, and events.

  • Build and maintain trusted relationships: Own follow-ups, host regular check-ins, and cultivate executive-level relationships that result in long-term collaborations.

  • Shape business solutions with partners: Work closely with partners to uncover challenges, co-develop integration use cases, and position Manus’s solutions to deliver measurable ROI.

  • Be the product–partner bridge: Develop deep product knowledge and fluency in technical requirements to confidently translate between partner needs and product capabilities.

  • Lead negotiations & influence outcomes: Run partnership discussions with senior stakeholders, aligning on business terms, timelines, and shared objectives.

  • Full lifecycle ownership: Take charge from prospecting through solution scoping, onboarding, launch execution, and ongoing performance tracking.

  • Measure & optimize impact: Track KPIs, analyze partnership outcomes, and propose strategies to maximize mutual value and scalability.

  • Collaborate cross-functionally: Partner with Product, Marketing, and Growth teams to ensure solutions are technically feasible and strategically aligned.

Requirements:

  • 2–5 years of professional experience in partnerships, business development, solution sales, or enterprise SaaS

  • Proven track record of business solutioning and/or product marketing—turning partner needs into actionable, high-impact use cases

  • Ability to engage in both business and technical discussions with confidence

  • Strong communication skills across email, calls, presentations, and executive-level meetings

jobs.title: Growth Operations Associate (Japan)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Mission:

Drive user and brand growth in Japan through localized content, community building, and scalable influencer (KOL / creator) campaigns; turn market feedback into product insights.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Plan and publish localized content (LinkedIn, X); ensure quality and consistency.

  • Review influencer shortlists and scripts (brand fit, compliance, audience relevance).

  • Coordinate with agencies and creators; handle part of influencer / partner email inbox.

  • Launch and track influencer campaigns (reach, engagement, conversion metrics).

  • Build and nurture online community; support selective offline meetups.

  • Collect and synthesize user and creator feedback for product localization.

  • Monitor growth dashboards; optimize based on data (A/B tests, funnel metrics).

  • Maintain organized documentation (briefs, trackers, post-mortems).

jobs.title: AI Product Manager Intern
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We’re looking for a curious and driven Product Management Intern to join our Evaluation team. If you’re excited about large language models and AI agents, enjoy hands-on experimentation, and love turning structure and insight into product impact, this role is for you. You’ll help define how we evaluate AI agent capabilities, design real-world task cases, benchmark AI tools, and drive continuous improvement of our agent product.

What You’ll Do

Evaluation Framework & Prompt Design

  • Build a structured framework to evaluate agent capabilities with clear, user-centric metrics

  • Design real-world tasks and prompts to simulate usage, test behaviors, and analyze outputs

  • Standardize and automate evaluation cases for scalable testing, while continuously refining based on insights and performance tracking

  • Work cross-functionally with product, engineering, and design to suggest practical improvement

Competitive Research & Tool Benchmarking

  • Stay up to date with leading LLMs and AI tools

  • Explore interaction patterns, product designs, and capability boundaries across tools

  • Deliver user-focused analysis and insights to guide product decisions

What We’re Looking For

  • Familiarity with large language models, agent-based products, and prompt engineering

  • Enthusiasm for the AI tool ecosystem, with a hands-on mindset: test, learn, and iterate

  • Structured thinker with strong curiosity and initiative—you’re eager to define problems and propose solutions

  • Prior experience in product design, user research, or prompt writing is a plus

jobs.title: Influencer Engagement Associate
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We are seeking a highly motivated and proactive Influencer Engagement Associate to join our dynamic team in Singapore. This role is pivotal in fostering strong relationships with key opinion leaders (KOLs) and influencers, driving impactful market communication initiatives, and ensuring the successful execution of collaborative projects. The ideal candidate will possess exceptional communication skills and a strong drive for results, contributing directly to our growth through effective partnership management.

Responsibilities:

  • Proactively identify and research potential collaboration partners, including key opinion leaders (KOLs) and influencers, across various platforms relevant to our target audience.

  • Initiate and manage communication with potential partners, effectively conveying our collaboration vision and mutual benefits.

  • Lead negotiation processes for partnership terms, ensuring alignment with project objectives and budget guidelines.

  • Plan and execute end-to-end collaborative campaigns, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality outcomes.

  • Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with influencers, fostering a collaborative and productive environment.

  • Monitor partnership performance, collect relevant data, and provide actionable insights for continuous improvement.

  • Stay updated on industry trends, emerging platforms, and best practices in influencer engagement and market communication.

  • Collaborate cross-functionally with internal teams to ensure seamless project integration and maximize impact.

  • Handle day-to-day operational tasks related to influencer partnerships, including content coordination, administrative support, and issue resolution.

Requirements:

  • Demonstrated ability to learn quickly and adapt to new challenges.

  • Strong execution capabilities with a focus on delivering tangible results.

  • Experience in building relationships and communicating with external partners or stakeholders.

  • Basic understanding of social media platforms and digital communication channels.

  • Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.

  • Proactive, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple tasks effectively.

  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.

  • Optional: Any relevant project experience or internships are a plus.

Manus excels at various tasks in work and life, getting everything done while you rest.At Manus AI, we offer a highly collaborative and innovative environment where experts across engineering, research, and business come together to push the boundaries of AI applications. jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About the Role
At Manus, we are leveraging data to build the future of AI-powered productivity. We are seeking a commercially-minded Data Analyst to join our team and partner with business leaders, product managers, and engineers. In this role, you will be at the heart of our decision-making process, translating complex data into actionable insights that drive product strategy, accelerate growth, and enhance user experience. If you are passionate about understanding users and using data to influence business outcomes in a fast-paced AI environment, this is the perfect opportunity for you.

Core Responsibilities
Business & Growth Analysis

- Analyze key business metrics, including revenue, cost, and profitability, to provide a clear view of business performance and inform strategic planning.

- Conduct in-depth analysis of user acquisition, retention, and expansion patterns to identify growth levers and optimize marketing strategies.

- Develop and maintain dashboards and reports that provide actionable insights to stakeholders across the company.

Product & User Insights

- Design and analyze A/B tests to evaluate the performance of new features and product changes, providing data-driven recommendations for product development.

- Conduct deep-dive analyses into user behavior to understand how users interact with our product, identifying pain points and opportunities for improvement.

- Perform cohort analysis and user segmentation to uncover trends in user engagement and value, informing targeted product and marketing initiatives.

We're Looking For Someone Who Has

Business Acumen

- With understanding of business dynamics and the ability to connect data with action.

- Strong commercial awareness, with experience in SaaS business models, user operations, or AI products being a significant advantage.

Analytical & Technical Skills

- Proficiency in SQL for complex data querying and experience with Python for data analysis and automation.

- Experience in using data visualization tools to create insightful and easy-to-understand dashboards.

Collaboration & Communication

- Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate complex analytical findings to both technical and non-technical audiences.

- A collaborative mindset and the ability to work effectively in a cross-functional team environment, partnering with product, engineering, and business teams.

Bonus Points

- With experience in a business analysis, product analysis, or data analysis role, preferably in a SaaS, AI, or technology company.

- Experience with AI-powered products.

About Manus AI

Manus is a general AI agent that bridges minds and actions: it doesn't just think, it delivers results. Manus excels at various tasks in work and life, getting everything done while you rest.At Manus AI, we offer a highly collaborative and innovative environment where experts across engineering, research, and business come together to push the boundaries of AI applications. If you're passionate about cutting-edge technology and making a real impact, we’d love to hear from you!

Contact us: recruiting@manus.im

jobs.title: Senior/Mid-level Frontend Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Job Description

We are looking for an experienced and passionate Senior/Mid-level Front-end Engineer to join our core product team and independently lead a new business initiative. You will have the opportunity to make a significant impact on our technology and product, and work with us to create world-class applications.

Key Responsibilities

  • Independently responsible for the front-end architecture design and development of a new business line.

  • Mentoring and developing junior engineers, organizing code reviews, and ensuring team code quality.

  • Exploring and introducing cutting-edge front-end technologies to continuously optimize the front-end development process and performance.

  • Collaborating closely with product, design, and back-end teams to create an exceptional user experience.

  • Shipping user-facing commercial products at scale with high quality standards.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.

  • 2-5 years of front-end development experience.

  • Strong foundation in computer science fundamentals, including data structures and algorithms.

  • Proficiency in modern JavaScript and TypeScript development.

  • Expertise with React and its ecosystem (Next.js, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind CSS).

  • Familiar with front-end engineering, modularization, and component-based development, with experience in large-scale projects.

  • In-depth research and practical experience in front-end performance optimization.

  • Passion for technology with strong attention to code quality and rapid learning abilities.

  • Good product awareness and teamwork spirit, with the ability to think proactively and solve problems.

  • Demonstrated interest in AI products and emerging technologies, with strong interest in AI technology and its applications.

Nice to Have

  • Experience developing AI products (chatbots, agent visualization, conversational interfaces, etc.).

  • Proficiency in leveraging AI tools to enhance development productivity and workflow efficiency.

  • Experience shipping user-facing commercial products at scale.

  • Experience with internationalization (i18n) development, including multi-language support, RTL/LTR layout adaptation, and timezone/currency handling.

  • Background in competitive analysis and technical research.

  • Active open source contributor with personal projects and technical experimentation.

  • Hands-on experience with Electron desktop application development.

jobs.title: Social Media Operation Intern
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About the role
We’re looking for someone who lives and breathes X (Twitter) and has the curiosity to know what’s trending before it hits the timeline. As our Professional Doomscroller, you’ll be the eyes and ears of Manus—spotting conversations we should join, surfacing insights from the AI/startup/tech community, and engaging with people in a way that’s sharp, human, and fun. This role isn’t about posting generic replies. It’s about crafting witty, thoughtful, and context-aware comments that make people stop scrolling and pay attention. You’ll help us build Manus’ voice on X as the “action engine” in AI, while learning how brands grow influence through social listening and community-driven engagement.

What you’ll do
- Monitor X for conversations around AI, startups, productivity, and tech—surfacing the right ones for us to engage in.
- Write and post witty, insightful replies under Manus’ account to amplify our presence and grow our network.
- Track what people are saying about Manus and related products—turning chatter into actionable insights.
- Spot cultural moments, memes, or debates we can join in real-time.
- Collaborate with our marketing team to shape Manus’ tone of voice and engagement strategy.

What you’ll learn
- How to grow a brand on X through community-led engagement.
- The ins and outs of social listening tools and workflows.
- How to translate trends into content and campaigns. - What it takes to build and protect a startup’s reputation online.

What we’re looking for
- You’re online a lot (really, a lot) and you actually enjoy it.
- You understand the cultural nuances of X—tech bros, AI skeptics, VCs, founders, builders, and meme accounts.
- You have a sharp, witty writing style that fits in with internet culture.
- You’re curious, fast, and unafraid to experiment.
- Bonus if you’ve already built an engaged following yourself.

Manus is a general AI agent that bridges minds and actions: it doesn't just think, it delivers results. Manus excels at various tasks in work and life, getting everything done while you rest. If you're passionate about cutting-edge technology and making a real impact, we’d love to hear from you!
Contact us: recruiting@manus.im

- How to translate trends into content and campaigns. - What it takes to build and protect a startup’s reputation online.

What we’re looking for
- You’re online a lot (really, a lot) and you actually enjoy it.
- You understand the cultural nuances of X—tech bros, AI skeptics, VCs, founders, builders, and meme accounts.
- You have a sharp, witty writing style that fits in with internet culture.
- You’re curious, fast, and unafraid to experiment.
- Bonus if you’ve already built an engaged following yourself.

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Job Description

We are looking for a proactive and energetic Junior Front-end Engineer to join our fast-growing team. You will have the opportunity to participate in building modern web applications, grow with our team of engineers, and develop into a key contributor with strong mentorship and guidance.

Key Responsibilities

  • Responsible for the front-end development, testing, and maintenance of web applications.

  • Collaborating with back-end engineers to implement product features and API integration.

  • Optimizing front-end performance to enhance user experience.

  • Participating in code reviews to ensure code quality.

  • Learning and applying new technologies with strong self-motivation.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.

  • Recent graduate (high potential) or 1-3 years of work experience.

  • Good foundation in computer science fundamentals, including data structures and algorithms.

  • Proficient in JavaScript/Typescript, HTML, and CSS.

  • Familiar with React and modern web development technologies.

  • Strong learning ability and problem-solving skills with a passion for technology.

  • Passionate about AI technology with a strong interest in exploring AI-powered development tools and understanding AI product design principles.

  • Demonstrated interest in AI products and emerging technologies.

Nice to Have

  • Experience with TypeScript development.

  • Familiarity with React ecosystem tools (Next.js, Redux, Tailwind CSS).

  • Experience using AI tools to enhance development productivity.

  • Personal projects or technical experimentation demonstrating self-learning abilities.

  • Open source contributions or active participation in technical communities.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer Intern
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Job Description

We are looking for a passionate and talented Front-end Developer Intern to join our team. You will have the opportunity to work with experienced engineers, contribute to building next-generation user interfaces, and bring innovation and energy to our products.

Key Responsibilities

  • Assisting in the development and maintenance of front-end interfaces for web applications.

  • Participating in the design and implementation of new features.

  • Collaborating with product managers and designers to ensure the quality and user experience of the final product.

  • Learning and applying the latest front-end technologies and best practices.

Required Qualifications

  • Currently enrolled in a top-tier university (Top 3 preferred) in Computer Science or related program, in your final year of study (expected graduation around May 2026).

  • Solid foundation in computer science fundamentals.

  • Familiar with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

  • Practical experience with React development.

  • Previous front-end related internship experience.

  • Good communication and teamwork skills.

  • Demonstrated interest in AI technology and its potential applications in front-end development.

  • Able to work in Singapore after graduation without visa sponsorship.

Nice to Have

  • Experience with modern JavaScript (ES6+) and basic TypeScript knowledge.

  • Familiarity with React ecosystem tools.

  • Personal projects demonstrating front-end development skills.

  • Experience using AI tools for coding or learning.

  • Active participation in technical communities or hackathons.

Note: High-performing interns will have the opportunity to be converted to full-time employees upon graduation. Exceptions may be made for candidates with exceptionally strong profiles.

jobs.title: Mobile Developer Intern
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Responsibilities

  • Build modular, reusable components and features

  • Continuously enhance mobile design and implementation processes to improve quality and efficiency

  • Optimize code to improve scalability, reliability, security, and performance of mobile applications

  • Collaborate with product design, product management, and software engineering teams to deliver best-in-class user experiences

Requirements

  • Currently pursuing or recently graduated with a major in Computer Science or a related field

  • Strong foundation in computer science fundamentals with understanding of operating systems, computer networks, and computer architecture

  • Solid programming skills with good coding practices and the ability to write clear, maintainable code

  • Passionate about mobile development and eager to learn how to deliver great app experiences

  • Positive attitude with a strong sense of responsibility, attention to detail, and willingness to collaborate in a team environment

  • Experience with personal or school app projects, or contributions to open-source projects, is a plus

  • Familiarity with Dart/Swift is preferred

  • Interest in the AI field, with enthusiasm for exploring and using various AI tools, is a plus

jobs.title: Ads Specialist
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Responsibilities:
- Manage the end-to-end process of ad campaigns, from setup and launch to monitoring and reporting.

- Conduct continuous data monitoring and analysis to optimize campaign performance, targeting, and budget allocation.

- Collaborate with the creative team to develop and test ad copy, visuals, and landing pages.

- Stay abreast of platform updates and emerging trends in digital advertising to identify new opportunities for growth.

- Provide regular performance reports to stakeholders, translating data into actionable insights and recommendations.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in managing and executing advertising campaigns on platforms such as Google Ads and Meta Ads.

- Strong understanding of the ad trafficking process, from creative submission to campaign launch.

- A good sense of what makes ad creatives effective, with experience in A/B testing and creative optimization.

- Excellent data analysis skills with the ability to interpret metrics, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.

- A proactive and detail-oriented approach to problem-solving.

- Collaborative working style.
